scripts.pretest: yarn clean && yarn lint && mkdir -p target
scripts.jenkins-test: mkdir -p target && ENV=ava ava test/unit --tap | tap-xunit --package unit > target/unit-test-report.xml
scripts.build: mkdir -p target/build && cp -r package.json yarn.lock src target/build/ && cd target/build && yarn install --prod
scripts.docker-build: yarn build && docker build -t $npm_package_name . && docker tag $npm_package_name:latest lifeomic/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version && docker save lifeomic/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version | gzip > $npm_package_name.tar.gz
